metadata.name: Joker Duality Fix (+red chests, +teleport 2.0)
metadata.description:
If you have Duality, the game doesn't let you choose between an angel or devil room when you use a Joker card. This mod will teleport you to a new room where you can choose.
As an added bonus, red chests and Teleport 2.0 are also supported.
This mod requires REPENTOGON.
